• 通过俯视地图定位摄像机与轴心点。
• 更直观的光照颜色与角度控制。

Punchline.Original: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.
Punchline.Translated: 卫月的延迟显示插件。

Description.Original: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.
Description.Translated: 卫月的延迟显示插件。

Punchline.Original: Reveals your hitbox, with customisable features. Endorsed by world first raiders!
Punchline.Translated: 显示你的受击判定框，支持自定义功能。世界首杀团队推荐！

Description.Original: Showing exactly where to stand since 2020. Endorsed by raiders!
Description.Translated: 自2020年起精准标记站位点，深受副本玩家信赖！

Punchline.Original: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.
Punchline.Translated: 在姓名板和聊天中显示轻量级职业信息。

Description.Original:
Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
Description.Translated:
在姓名板和聊天中显示轻量职业信息。通过右键菜单创建自定义标签并添加到玩家身上。

你想参与贡献并帮助开发新功能，或扩展现有功能？欢迎Fork并提交Pull Request！

本插件最初由r00telement开发，后由Pilzinsel64接手维护。

Punchline.Original: Keep track of players you meet.
Punchline.Translated: 记录你遇到的玩家。

Description.Original:
PlayerTrack helps you keep a record of who you meet and the content you played together.
Organize players into categories, keep notes, and track them across name/world changes.
Customization options include colors, icons, nameplates, and alerts.
Description.Translated:
PlayerTrack帮你记录相遇的玩家及共同参与的内容。  
可分类整理玩家、添加备注，并追踪跨服务器/改名的情况。  
支持颜色、图标、名牌和提醒等自定义选项。

Punchline.Original: Never guess whether you'll make that positional again!
Punchline.Translated: 再也不用猜能否打出位置技能了！

Description.Original: If you have a hard time telling whether you're in the right spot for positional attacks, this plugin can draw guidelines on your screen to help you tell where you need to be.
Description.Translated: 如果你难以判断是否处于合适的位置发动身位技能，这个插件可以在屏幕上绘制引导线，帮助你确认需要站位的正确位置。

Punchline.Original: Changes in-game dialogue to reference your desired gender and name.
Punchline.Translated: 将游戏内对话改为引用你指定的性别和名称。

Description.Original:
Your character is personal, so you should be able to have NPCs refer to them
the way that you want. With PrefPro, you can control which text option
will appear when an NPC uses dialogue meant for a specific in-game gender.
This allows you to use a female player model and be referred to as male, and
vice versa. In addition, there are a few name customization options - if you
want to only be referred to by your last name, so be it.
Note: This plugin currently will not swap voiced cutscene dialogue.
Description.Translated:
你的角色是个人化的，因此你应该能让NPC按照你想要的方式称呼他们。通过PrefPro插件，你可以控制当NPC使用针对特定游戏内性别的对话时显示哪种文本选项。这允许你使用女性角色模型但被当作男性称呼，反之亦然。此外还提供了一些姓名自定义选项——如果你只想被称呼姓氏，也可以实现。
注意：当前版本插件不会替换有配音的过场动画对话。

Punchline.Original: Quickly price check your items.
Punchline.Translated: 快速查询物品价格。

Description.Original:
To check prices, hold your keybind and then hover over an item or via the item's context menu.
The prices are pulled from the crowd-sourced site Universalis.
Description.Translated:
要查看价格，请按住快捷键并悬停在物品上，或通过物品的右键菜单操作。
价格数据来源于众包网站Universalis。

Punchline.Original: See item marketboard prices on hover!
Punchline.Translated: 悬停查看物品市场板价格！

Description.Original:
Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.
Description.Translated:
当你鼠标悬停在物品上时，会在底部显示该物品普通品质/精制品质的市场板价格以及最近交易记录。
价格数据来自Universalis.app并缓存90分钟。
如需刷新价格，可在悬停时按下Alt键。

Punchline.Original: Furniture selection that actually works properly
Punchline.Translated: 正常运作的家具选择功能

Description.Original: An improved housing experience. Furniture selection based on what you see, keybinds to switch modes and toggle counter and snap.
Description.Translated: 改善的房屋系统体验。基于所见即所得的家具选择，可通过快捷键切换模式、开启计数器和吸附功能。

Punchline.Original: Mobile push notifications for the Party Finder.
Punchline.Translated: 小队招募的移动推送通知。

Description.Original: A plugin that uses Pushover (https://pushover.net), Discord, SimplePush (http://simplepush.io), or Ntfy (https://ntfy.sh) to send mobile push notifications when party members join or leave, or when a duty finder queue is initiated.
Description.Translated: 一款使用Pushover(https://pushover.net)、Discord、SimplePush(http://simplepush.io)或Ntfy(https://ntfy.sh)发送移动推送通知的插件，可在队友加入/离开或任务搜索器队列开始时触发。

Punchline.Original: Do you want an announcer in your PvP Matches? Metem has offered to be of service!
Punchline.Translated: 你想要在PvP比赛中拥有一个播报员吗？Metem愿意为您效劳！

Description.Original:
This plugin will cause Metems voice lines to play mid-match upon specific conditions being met.

You must have Dawntrail installed & Voice Lines unmuted for this plugin to function!
Description.Translated:
该插件会在满足特定条件时在比赛期间播放梅腾的语音台词。

你必须已安装《晓月之终途》并保持语音台词未静音才能使该插件生效！

Punchline.Original: PvP match history and stats tracker.
Punchline.Translated: PvP对战记录与数据统计追踪器。

Description.Original: Record, browse and filter your Crystalline Conflict, Frontline and Rival Wings match history, view match scoreboards and view aggregated statistics like win rate and average damage dealt per match.
Description.Translated: 记录、浏览并筛选你的水晶冲突、纷争前线与红莲节战场对战历史，查看比赛计分板及综合统计数据（如胜率、场均伤害等）。

Punchline.Original: Customizable ImGui hotbars
Punchline.Translated: 可自定义的ImGui热键栏

Description.Original:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.
Description.Translated:
一款旨在为聊天指令或其他插件提供简洁、可定制且常驻界面的插件，通过减少对宏和热键栏空间的依赖来实现类似功能。

该插件初始会以一个小方框的形式显示在游戏窗口底部中央。

Punchline.Original: Removes unwanted icons from your map.
Punchline.Translated: 移除地图上不需要的图标。

Description.Original: Removes unwanted icons from your map. Not only quests, any icons.
Description.Translated: 移除地图上不需要的图标。不仅是任务，任何图标都能移除。

Punchline.Original: See details about quests that the FFXIV doesn't tell you.
Punchline.Translated: 查看FF14游戏内未告知的任务详情。

Description.Original: Quest Journal is a detailed quest tracker / viewer. Letting you see information about quest chains without using a wiki.
Description.Translated: 任务日志是一款详细的任务追踪/查看器。让你无需查阅维基就能查看任务链信息。

Punchline.Original: Explore quests and their rewards.
Punchline.Translated: 探索任务及其奖励。

Description.Original:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project
Description.Translated:
探索任务及其奖励
- 搜索任务名称或其奖励，包括副本、蛮族、宠物等
- 查看任务需求与解锁的交互式地图
- 即使未完成任务也能查看任务信息窗口
- 在地图上显示任务起始位置或在日志中打开任务

图标：藏宝图由Anthony Ledoux提供，锁定书本由Anthony Ledoux提供

Punchline.Original: Share your quest progress with others.
Punchline.Translated: 与他人分享你的任务进度。

Description.Original: Follow your friends on their questing journey by seeing their progress through a shared quest. Provides markers for quest destinations and (soon) teleporting features.
Description.Translated: 通过共享任务追踪好友的冒险进度。提供任务目标标记功能（即将支持传送功能）。

Punchline.Original: For the quest completionist
Punchline.Translated: 为任务收集狂

Description.Original: Easily track quest completion
Description.Translated: 轻松追踪任务完成情况

Punchline.Original: Stop yer ears bleedin' in the Wolves' Den
Punchline.Translated: 别让狼狱的噪音折磨你的耳朵

Description.Original: Auto-mute BGM while in the Wolves' Den, because I've had enough and it ends here.
Description.Translated: 在狼狱竞技场自动静音背景音乐，因为我受够了，到此为止。

Punchline.Original: Simmer does the light before every login.
Punchline.Translated: 登录前会进行光照预热。

Description.Original: Displays a random dialogue, and/or the datacenter you'll be connecting to when you press GAME START.
Description.Translated: 显示随机对话和/或按下开始游戏时你将连接的数据中心。

Punchline.Original: Realtime RP bios
Punchline.Translated: 实时RP角色简介

Description.Original: Realtime Roleplay sheets
Description.Translated: 实时角色扮演表格

Punchline.Original: Time your jumping puzzles!
Punchline.Translated: 计时你的跳跃解谜！

Description.Original: A simple plugin for timing, logging, and ranking player times for your jumping puzzles!
Description.Translated: 一个简单的插件，用于计时、记录和排名玩家在跳跃谜题中的用时！

Punchline.Original: Can't decide what class to work on today? Let the plugin decide for you!
Punchline.Translated: 不知道该练哪个职业？让插件帮你决定吧！

Description.Original: Allows you to select a random class to do dailies/etc on.
Description.Translated: 允许你随机选择一个职业来完成日常任务等。

Punchline.Original: Display the battery level of your wireless Razer devices
Punchline.Translated: 显示无线雷蛇设备的电池电量

Description.Original: Select your installed version of Razer Synapse to automatically pull device battery levels from local log files
Description.Translated: 选择您安装的雷蛇Synapse版本，自动从本地日志文件中获取设备电量信息

Punchline.Original: Improve your Island Sanctuary experience.
Punchline.Translated: 提升你的无人岛体验。

Description.Original:
A plugin to improve Island Sanctuary. Features:

- Mark items to gather on the proper map
- Gathering & crafting todo-list, showing you what mats you require
- Widget for quick access to information

Icon from the Mutant Standard project.
Description.Translated:
一个改善无人岛体验的插件。功能包括：

- 在对应地图上标记需采集的物品
- 采集与制作待办清单，显示所需材料
- 快捷信息访问组件

图标来自Mutant Standard项目。

Punchline.Original: Extends the game's built-in ready check.
Punchline.Translated: 扩展游戏的默认准备确认功能。

Description.Original: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.
Description.Translated: 在准备检查完成后于聊天栏显示未就绪玩家名称，并可选择在团队与同盟列表上方添加准备检查状态图标。

Punchline.Original: Simple mouseover and ground-targeting action integration
Punchline.Translated: 简易鼠标悬停与地面目标技能集成

Description.Original: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros and ground-targeted actions! Type /redirect to configure.
Description.Translated: 轻松更改法术与技能的目标优先级。支持宏队列和地面目标技能！输入/redirect进行配置。

Punchline.Original: Crowdsourced PF website (upload PF listings to xivpf.com)
Punchline.Translated: 众筹招募板网站（将招募信息上传至xivpf.com）

Description.Original:
Uploads the PF listings you retrieve to the crowdsourced Remote
Party Finder website (https://xivpf.com/).
Description.Translated: 将你检索到的招募信息上传至众包远程招募板网站(https://xivpf.com/)。

Punchline.Original: Dynamically adjust your object rendering settings.
Punchline.Translated: 动态调整你的物体渲染设置。

Description.Original: Allows you to dynamically adjust the in-game setting for rendered objects by FPS (and GPU Usage if you're on windows) and allows you to set a custom number of rendered objects manually. Uses GPU usage and FPS on Windows, and FPS only on Wine.
Description.Translated: 允许你根据FPS（在Windows系统下还包括GPU使用率）动态调整游戏内渲染对象的设置，并支持手动设置自定义的渲染对象数量。在Windows上使用GPU使用率和FPS作为指标，在Wine环境下仅使用FPS。

Punchline.Original: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!
Punchline.Translated: 再也不会忘记修理和抽取魔晶石了！

Description.Original: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted.
Description.Translated: 帮助你留意装备需要修理或可提取晶簇的时机。

Punchline.Original: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.
Punchline.Translated: 带有可选众包功能的路径记录器。

Description.Original:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Information on the crowdsourced paths is available
at https://rl2.perchbird.dev.
Open the UI with /reslog.
Description.Translated:
ResLogger2 允许你在一个快速便捷的窗口中记录游戏加载的路径，提供多种选项包括仅记录唯一路径、路径过滤器以及上传发现的路径。关于众筹路径的信息可在 https://rl2.perchbird.dev 查看。
使用 /reslog 命令打开界面。

Punchline.Original: Utility for hosts in Forked Tower runs.
Punchline.Translated: 分塔副本房主实用工具。

Description.Original: List various information about nearby players such as Phantom Job, Remaining Resurrection Stacks in Forked Tower: Blood and Knowledge Level. Use /ressc [settings] to open the main or settings window.
Description.Translated: 显示附近玩家的各类信息，包括幻影职业、分叉塔：血与知识中的剩余复活层数以及知识等级。使用/ressc [settings]命令可打开主窗口或设置窗口。

Punchline.Original: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!
Punchline.Translated: 自由移动和缩放默认HUD元素！

Description.Original: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
Description.Translated: 允许你更自由精确地调整HUD元素的缩放和位置。

Punchline.Original: Reminds you about retainer ventures.
Punchline.Translated: 提醒您检查雇员探险任务。

Description.Original: A simple plugin to remind you when your retainers are done with their ventures.
Description.Translated: 一个简单的插件，用于提醒你雇员已完成探险任务。

Punchline.Original: See retainer sales quicker
Punchline.Translated: 更快查看雇员销售情况

Description.Original: Quickly see which retainers have sold something while you were logged off.
Description.Translated: 快速查看哪些雇员在你下线期间售出了物品。

Punchline.Original: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.
Punchline.Translated: 高亮显示复活技能与负面状态效果。

Description.Original:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.
Description.Translated:
快速查看当前谁在复活谁、
谁已被复活、
以及在世界界面或小队/团队界面中
具有可移除减益状态效果的成员。

Punchline.Original: Lower 3D Resolution Scale
Punchline.Translated: 降低3D分辨率比例

Description.Original:
Ever wanted to render at lower resolution? Now you can!
Only works with AMD FSR graphics upscaler
Description.Translated:
一直想以更低分辨率渲染？现在可以了！
仅适用于AMD FSR图像升级技术

Punchline.Original: Display profiles from Chaos Archives, Crystal Archives, and Central Archives in-game
Punchline.Translated: 在游戏中显示来自混沌档案、水晶档案和中央档案的配置

Description.Original: A plugin for roleplayers, displaying character profiles from Central Archives (centralarchives.org) and its regional RP portals, Chaos Archives (chaosarchives.org) and Crystal Archives (crystalarchives.org), for characters with the RP flag on.
Description.Translated: 面向角色扮演玩家的插件，可从Central Archives（centralarchives.org）及其区域RP门户站Chaos Archives（chaosarchives.org）和Crystal Archives（crystalarchives.org）显示已开启RP标记的角色档案。

Punchline.Original: Supporting your RP needs.
Punchline.Translated: 支持你的角色扮演需求。

Description.Original: A suite (eventually) of features to support roleplay. Currently only the sonar. /rputils
Description.Translated: 一套（最终将包含多项功能的）角色扮演辅助工具集。当前仅包含声呐功能。/rputils

Punchline.Original: I spent hours wokring hard coding so I could be lazy! Wouldn't you?'
Punchline.Translated: 我花了好几小时努力编程，就是为了能偷懒！你不也一样吗？

Description.Original: Auto counter for S Rank Summoning! Counts kills, gathering attempts, and even discarding items. Tracker is per zone so you can keep track of multiple locations at once. Even tracks the kills of others.
Description.Translated: S级怪物召唤自动计数器！统计击杀数、采集尝试次数甚至丢弃物品次数。追踪器按区域划分，可同时追踪多个地点。还能记录他人的击杀数。

Punchline.Original: OBS automation based on game events via SAMMI webhooks
Punchline.Translated: 基于游戏事件的OBS自动化（通过SAMMI webhook实现）

Description.Original:
Sends game data SAMMI via webhook, allowing users to automate OBS actions such as playing effects, transitions, sounds, etc. based on in-game events.
Requires SAMMI and OBS to function. See https://sammi.solutions or the plugin's readme on GitHub.
/psammi to configure.
Description.Translated:
通过Webhook发送游戏数据至SAMMI，让用户能根据游戏内事件自动触发OBS操作，如播放特效、转场、音效等。
需配合SAMMI和OBS使用。详见https://sammi.solutions或GitHub上的插件说明文档。
输入/psammi进行配置。

Punchline.Original: A helper plugin for pre-populating hunt train scout tracker links
Punchline.Translated: 用于预填充狩猎车侦察追踪器链接的辅助插件

Description.Original: A helper for generating scout tracker links for a-rank hunt trains
Description.Translated: 生成A级狩猎车侦察追踪链接的辅助工具

Punchline.Original: Get notified when someone enters or exits your mount!
Punchline.Translated: 当有人进入或离开你的坐骑时获得通知！

Description.Original: Adds chat or toast notifications whenever someone enters or exits your mount.
Description.Translated: 当有人进入或离开你的坐骑时，添加聊天或弹窗通知。

Punchline.Original: Remember to check your posture!
Punchline.Translated: 记得检查你的姿势！

Description.Original: Configurable reminders to hydrate and maintain a healthy posture.
Description.Translated: 可配置的喝水与保持健康坐姿提醒。

Punchline.Original: Per-zone system and character configurations
Punchline.Translated: 每区域系统与角色配置

Description.Original:
Settings Enhanced allows you to create zone-specific system and character configurations; For example, you could lower the amount of rendered players in Limsa, or mute other players sound effects while in stellar crafting zones. Your original configuration data is stored and automatically re-applies when entering an area with you have not created zone setting for, or when disabling the plugin/closing the game.

It is recommended that you create regular backups whilst using this plugin incase something does does break - upon install a check will be ran to see if at least one system/character configuration backup has been created; You will not be able to use the plugin if until you have created one.
Description.Translated:
设置增强允许你创建区域特定的系统和角色配置；例如，你可以在利姆萨·罗敏萨降低渲染玩家数量，或在星辉工坊区域静音其他玩家的音效。你的原始配置数据会被保存，并在进入未设置区域或禁用插件/关闭游戏时自动恢复。

建议在使用此插件时定期创建备份以防意外情况——安装时会检查是否至少创建了一个系统/角色配置备份；在创建备份前你将无法使用该插件。

Punchline.Original: Bringing Shananigans to Eorzea
Punchline.Translated: 将欢乐恶作剧带到艾欧泽亚

Description.Original: Replaces the word 'Gil' with 'Shanbells' (or something else entirely!) in the Currency window and Tooltips.
Description.Translated: 将货币窗口和提示中的"金币"替换为"仙贝铃"(或其他自定义名称)。

Punchline.Original: Shows you what items vendors won't sell you yet.
Punchline.Translated: 显示商人尚未向你出售的物品。

Description.Original: Opens a window when speaking with a supported vendor, showing items that are not unlocked and what their conditions are. It checks quests, achievements, and reputation requirements.
Description.Translated: 与受支持的商人对话时打开一个窗口，显示未解锁的物品及其解锁条件。它会检查任务、成就和声望要求。

Punchline.Original: Shows your gear in the Fitting Room by default.
Punchline.Translated: 默认在试衣间显示你的装备。

Description.Original:
Normally the Fitting Room defaults to showing you just the piece of gear you’re trying on. This plugin inverts that behaviour: when you launch the game, the Fitting Room (plus Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection) will show all your gear by default.

NB: there are some oddities to how Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection behave when this plugin is doing its thing. If you’d rather it not touch those windows at all, there’s an option for that (and more details about the problem) in the settings.

Icon adapted from OpenMoji, CC BY-SA 4.0.
Description.Translated:
通常情况下，试衣间默认仅显示你正在试穿的装备部件。本插件反转了这一行为：当你启动游戏时，试衣间（包括染色与幻化模板选择界面）将默认显示你所有的装备。

注意：当本插件生效时，染色与幻化模板选择界面的行为可能会出现一些异常。如果你希望插件完全不干涉这些窗口，设置中提供了相关选项（并附有关于该问题的更多详情）。

图标改编自OpenMoji，遵循CC BY-SA 4.0协议。

Punchline.Original: Automatically rename your screenshots with character and location info.
Punchline.Translated: 自动根据角色与位置信息重命名截图。

Description.Original: Renames screenshots as they are created to include character name, map name, and coordinates. Monitors default, Reshade and GShade screenshots.
Description.Translated: 将截图文件重命名为包含角色名、地图名称和坐标的格式。支持监控默认截图、Reshade和GShade截图。

Punchline.Original: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.
Punchline.Translated: 让聊天更有趣，支持海盗语和乌尔缇诺语等翻译风格。

Description.Original:
Allows you to translate player and NPC chat messages/bubbles.
Supported languages include: Pirate, Urianger, Leet, Pig Latin, Turkey, Moogle & Chocobo.
Description.Translated:
允许翻译玩家与NPC的聊天内容/对话框气泡。  
支持语言包括：海盗语、古代语、网络语、猪拉丁语、火鸡语、莫古力语及陆行鸟语。

Punchline.Original: Simple item comparison
Punchline.Translated: 简易物品对比

Description.Original: Show simple item comparison when pressing SHIFT and hovering over item
Description.Translated: 按下SHIFT并悬停物品时显示简易物品对比

Punchline.Original: Automatically keep track of treasure hunt maps within your party.
Punchline.Translated: 自动追踪队伍中的藏宝图。

Description.Original: Utilizes an external server to share your current treasure hunt target with your party members.
Description.Translated: 通过外部服务器与队友共享你当前的寻宝目标。

Punchline.Original: A simple and compact market board plugin for power users.
Punchline.Translated: 专为重度用户设计的简洁小巧市场布告板插件。

Description.Original:
A niche plugin designed to be user-friendly and multi-functional with rich customisation options, for power users.

Highlights:
  - Compact UI and user theme
  - Customisable search options
  - Rich ways for plugin interaction

Check out the 'Introduction' on Config Window for documentation.
Description.Translated:
一款专为高级用户设计的友好型多功能插件，提供丰富的自定义选项。

亮点功能：
  - 紧凑界面与用户主题
  - 可自定义搜索选项
  - 丰富的插件交互方式

请在配置窗口查看"介绍"获取文档说明。

Punchline.Original: A simple Todo List
Punchline.Translated: 简单的待办事项列表

Description.Original:
/ptodo to open the Todo List
/ptodoconfig to open the Configuration
Description.Translated:
/ptodo 打开待办事项列表
/ptodoconfig 打开配置界面

Punchline.Original: This was supposed to be simple...
Punchline.Translated: 这本来应该很简单...

Description.Original:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)
Description.Translated:
一系列便利性调整插件。旨在不进行剧烈改动的前提下提升游戏体验。  
所有修改功能均可开关，默认全部关闭。完整功能列表请访问代码库（下方地球图标）。

Punchline.Original: Skill mod creator
Punchline.Translated: 技能模组创建器

Description.Original: Create animation replacement mods for Textools or Penumbra. Icon by PAPACHIN
Description.Translated: 为Textools或Penumbra创建动画替换模组。图标由PAPACHIN制作

Punchline.Original: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.
Punchline.Translated: 在当前目标独立窗口中显示聊天消息。

Description.Original: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
Description.Translated: 新增`/snooper`指令，可显示独立窗口仅展示当前选中玩家的聊天消息。便于在拥挤的RP活动期间追踪不同对话。

Punchline.Original: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Punchline.Translated: 自动发送和接收狩猎与临危受命接力信息。

Description.Original: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. Support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Description.Translated: 自动发送和接收狩猎与临危受命情报。/sonar 打开，/sonarconfig 配置。仅限 Sonar Support discord 服务器提供支持。

Punchline.Original: Total customization of your inventory
Punchline.Translated: 完全自定义你的物品栏

Description.Original: Sort your inventory however you want and keep it sorted.
Description.Translated: 按你喜欢的任何方式整理背包并保持排序。

Punchline.Original: Quiets the PvP Experience.
Punchline.Translated: 静默PvP体验。

Description.Original:
This plugin silences all text sound effects and quick chat while in PvP zones including the Wolves Den.
No Configuration needed! Just install and forget.

For feedback, please contact .spider in the Dalamud discord.
Description.Translated:
该插件可在PvP区域（包括狼狱演武场）静默所有文字音效和快捷聊天。  
无需配置！安装即用。  

如需反馈，请联系Dalamud Discord中的.spider。

Punchline.Original: Filter any game sound.
Punchline.Translated: 过滤任意游戏音效。

Description.Original:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

Icons: filter by Kirby Wu from the Noun Project
and Sound by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
Description.Translated:
过滤游戏中任意音效或一组音效。

- 移除你不喜欢的战斗音效
- 移除特定表情动作音效
- 移除特定背景音乐

图标：由Noun Project的Kirby Wu提供（过滤相关）
及Noun Project的Gregor Cresnar提供（音效相关）

Punchline.Original: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.
Punchline.Translated: 一个可在任何场景（包括拍照模式和过场动画）调节音量的Dalamud插件

Description.Original: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.
Description.Translated: 一个可在任何场景（包括拍照模式和过场动画）调节音量的Dalamud插件

Punchline.Original: Because multiplication is hard.
Punchline.Translated: 因为乘法很难。

Description.Original: Shows the vendor sell price for the full stack of an item on the tooltip
Description.Translated: 在物品提示上显示整组物品的商人出售价格

Punchline.Original: Witty commentary to the brilliant things you do.
Punchline.Translated: 对你精彩操作的机智点评。

Description.Original: Check /narrator for full options or use /narratorvolume to set volume manually.
Description.Translated: 查看 /narrator 获取完整选项，或使用 /narratorvolume 手动设置音量。

Punchline.Original: Add contrast to your status icons
Punchline.Translated: 为你的状态图标添加对比度

Description.Original: You will finally be able to easily see the timer of your buffs/debuffs properly when the arena background is bright!
Description.Translated: 你终于能在明亮的场地背景下清晰地看到增益/减益效果的计时器了！

Punchline.Original: Before StatusTimers, my buffs/debuffs were a mystery. Now, it's a well-organized history!
Punchline.Translated: 以前状态计时器让我摸不着头脑，现在它成了井井有条的历史记录！

Description.Original: StatusTimers provides clear, customizable bars for tracking your crucial buffs and debuffs. It helps you keep an eye on active effects, their remaining durations, and stacks, allowing you to optimize your gameplay without constantly staring at your tiny icons.
Description.Translated: 状态计时器提供清晰可定制的进度条，用于追踪关键增益与减益效果。它能帮你监控激活状态、剩余持续时间及层数，让你无需紧盯小图标即可优化战斗表现。

Punchline.Original: Like /focustarget, but with no overrides.
Punchline.Translated: 类似于/focustarget，但不会覆盖现有目标。

Description.Original:
(PvE-only.) Adds the /stickyfocustarget command, which focuses your current
target, as long as you do not already have a focus target set.
  
Have you ever felt focusing was under-utilised? Wanted to use it without a
dedicated keybind? Do you not even know what focus targeting is?
You've come to the right place.
  
You can add this command to your Attack Nearest macro and ensure that the
first enemy you target will also become focused, and stay that way, until it dies.
With this, you can focus enemies without having to consciously press a keybind,
and ensure that, for instance, when a focused boss spawns an add and you target it,
the boss' focus will NOT get overriden.

This plugin does not change the behaviour of the stock /focustarget command,
and must be triggered either manually or by adding it to a macro.
Placeholders are supported.
Description.Translated:
（仅限PvE。）添加/stickyfocustarget命令，只要你尚未设置焦点目标，该命令会将当前目标持续设为焦点。

你是否觉得焦点功能未被充分利用？想不占用专属快捷键就使用它？甚至不知道焦点目标是什么？
你来对地方了。

可将此命令加入"攻击最近目标"宏，确保你首次选中的敌人会自动成为焦点并保持到死亡。
这样你无需刻意按快捷键就能锁定焦点目标，例如当焦点BOSS召唤小怪时选中小怪，BOSS的焦点也不会被覆盖。

本插件不会改变游戏原生的/focustarget命令行为，需手动触发或加入宏使用。
支持占位符。

Punchline.Original: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
Punchline.Translated: 显示当前目标在已停运游戏《Wildstar》中Stormtalons形态下的生命值。

Description.Original: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
Description.Translated: 显示当前目标在已停运游戏《Wildstar》中Stormtalons形态下的生命值。

Punchline.Original: You do not talk about Fight Club, same for Submarines
Punchline.Translated: 你不能谈论搏击俱乐部，潜水艇同理。

Description.Original:
+ Tracker for current builds, routes and times 
+ Builder to improve, solve builds and optimize EXP
+ Configurable notification for return and repairs 
+ Helpy filled useful information
+ Custom loot overview with history and export
+ Multiple overlays to help with daily tasks 
+ Supports multiple FCs
Description.Translated:
+ 当前建造方案、路线及时间的追踪器
+ 优化建造方案、解决问题并最大化经验值的建造工具
+ 可配置的返回与修理通知
+ 包含实用信息的帮助系统
+ 带有历史记录与导出功能的自定义战利品概览
+ 辅助日常任务的多重悬浮窗
+ 支持多个部队工房

Punchline.Original: Customizable ring-shaped hotbars
Punchline.Translated: 可自定义的环形热键栏

Description.Original: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets, Macros and more...
Description.Translated: 高度可配置的热键栏，可通过快捷键切换。可填充技能、物品、装备方案、宏等内容...

Punchline.Original: Automatically copy ANY text on your screen by choice.
Punchline.Translated: 自动复制屏幕上任意选定文本。

Description.Original:
Automatically copy ANY text on your screen.

There are two modes:
        -Normal Mode: Automatically copies a select number of text elements to your clipboard.
        -Text Copy Mode: This mode allows you to copy the text of ANY text element on the screen.

Default keybinds to toggle between the two modes are:
      [Left Control] [Left Shift] [Spacebar]
Description.Translated:
自动复制屏幕上的任意文本

有两种模式：
        -普通模式：自动将选定数量的文本元素复制到剪贴板
        -文本复制模式：可复制屏幕上任意文本元素的文本内容

默认切换模式的快捷键为：
      [左Ctrl] [左Shift] [空格键]

Punchline.Original: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu
Punchline.Translated: 你现在可以从房屋菜单选择家具

Description.Original:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you
Description.Translated:
当前，选择房屋物品的唯一方法是点击家具本身，当多个物品紧邻时可能会造成困扰。

此插件在房屋菜单中新增了一个选项，可自动为您选中家具。

Punchline.Original: Customizable target lines
Punchline.Translated: 可自定义目标线

Description.Original: Customizable target lines
Description.Translated: 可自定义目标线

Punchline.Original: Tataru Punch
Punchline.Translated: 塔塔露之拳

Description.Original: Chat Translator
Description.Translated: 聊天翻译器

Punchline.Original: Adds a new menu when right clicking items that lets you easily add/remove items to a list and then export it to Teamcraft
Punchline.Translated: 右键点击物品时新增菜单，可便捷地将物品添加到列表或移除，并导出至Teamcraft

Description.Original:
No more alt tabbing, no more writing down names of items, just add and export!

This plugin is not created by Teamcraft staff and they are not responsible for it. To report issues or request new features, please click the globe icon and submit them using the issues tab.

(Logo used with permission from Teamcraft owner)
Description.Translated:
不需要频繁切换窗口，也不必手动记录物品名称，直接添加并导出即可！  

此插件并非Teamcraft团队开发，他们不对本插件负责。如需反馈问题或申请新功能，请点击地球图标并通过问题选项卡提交。  

（Logo已获得Teamcraft所有者许可使用）

Punchline.Original: Chat Commands for Teleporting
Punchline.Translated: 传送用聊天指令

Description.Original:
Adds Chat Commands to Teleport to Aetherytes or Areas by Name.
e.g. /tp Quarrymill or /tpm South Shroud
Supports setting up an Alias for Aetherytes to be used with Teleporter Commands
e.g. /tp home instead of /tp Estate Hall (Free Company)
Description.Translated:
添加通过名称传送至以太水晶或区域的聊天指令。  
例如：/tp 石场水车 或 /tpm 南森  
支持为以太水晶设置别名，用于传送指令  
例如：/tp 家 替代 /tp 部队大厅

Punchline.Original: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
Punchline.Translated: 允许将所有文本框替换为你选择的背景。

Description.Original: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
Description.Translated: 允许将所有文本框替换为你选择的背景。

Punchline.Original: Chat and game dialogue TTS plugin.
Punchline.Translated: 聊天与游戏对话文本转语音插件。

Description.Original: Chat and game dialogue TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.
Description.Translated: 聊天和游戏对话文本转语音。使用/tttconfig命令配置启用的频道与触发条件/例外规则。

Punchline.Original: Configure sounds for critical and direct hits, plus some countdown music.
Punchline.Translated: 配置暴击和直击的音效，以及倒计时音乐。

Description.Original:
* Set sounds and flavor text to be played/shown whenever you deal direct or critical damage or heal.
* Set sounds to be played when a countdown is in progress.
* Use different configurations by job.
* Use the game's SFX or your own custom WAV or MP3 files.
Description.Translated:
* 设置在你造成直击或暴击伤害/治疗时播放的音效和显示的文字。
* 设置倒计时进行时播放的音效。
* 按职业使用不同配置。
* 使用游戏内置音效或自定义WAV/MP3文件。

Punchline.Original:
[REQUIRES TF2 INSTALLED FOR MOST FEATURES] The Mann Brothers just found a deposit of gravel in Eorzea
and hired YOU, Mercenary of Light, to help them FIGHT for it.
Punchline.Translated:
[需要安装TF2才能使用大部分功能] Mann兄弟在艾欧泽亚发现了一处砾石矿藏
并雇佣了你——光之佣兵——来帮他们争夺开采权。

Description.Original:
* Show a Win Panel (with sounds!) when you clear or get wiped in a duty.
* Show a TF2-style timer while in a duty.
* Enable the "Voice Lines" module (via /tfconfig) to have voice lines play when certain conditions are met. What conditions, you ask? It's a surprise! (Unless you uncheck the "Surprise me!" box.)
* More features maybe soon?

Note: This plugin uses files from a local Team Fortress 2 installation.
It'll search for the game's installation folder in all configured Steam Library Folders automatically.

Without a TF2 install, the Timer and Win Panel will work with FF XIV fonts, and no voice line will work.
Description.Translated:
* 在副本通关或团灭时显示胜利面板（带音效！）
* 在副本内显示TF2风格的计时器
* 启用"语音台词"模块（通过/tfconfig命令）可在满足特定条件时播放语音台词。什么条件？这是个惊喜！（除非你取消勾选"给我惊喜！"选项）
* 更多功能可能即将推出？

注：本插件需使用本地安装的《军团要塞2》游戏文件
它会自动在所有配置的Steam游戏库文件夹中搜索游戏安装目录

若未安装TF2，计时器和胜利面板将使用FF14默认字体运行，且所有语音台词功能均不可用

Punchline.Original: A dot to mark players hitbox.
Punchline.Translated: 标记玩家受击判定范围的圆点。

Description.Original: A dot to mark players hitbox
Description.Translated: 用于标记玩家命中判定点的圆点

Punchline.Original: Add separators to various numbers.
Punchline.Translated: 为各类数字添加分隔符。

Description.Original:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips
Description.Translated:
为各类数字添加分隔符。

- 伤害/治疗数值（不包括持续伤害或其他玩家的数值）
- 小队列表生命值
- 热键栏上的技能消耗
- 工具提示中的技能消耗

Punchline.Original: Set your character's title - now with Searchalin!
Punchline.Translated: 设置你的角色称号 - 现已支持Searchalin搜索功能！

Description.Original:
The Heart of the Party is a remake of the in-game title picker, but it
supports searching. Note that it doesn't add a command to set your title; use
the built-in /title command instead.
Description.Translated: 《团队核心》是对游戏内称号选择器的重构版本，但新增了搜索功能。请注意它并未添加设置称号的命令，请使用内置的/title命令。

Punchline.Original: Tracks the current tick for HP/MP/GP regen
Punchline.Translated: 追踪当前HP/MP/GP恢复的周期计时

Description.Original: Customizable bars that indicate the tick progress of HP/MP/GP regen
Description.Translated: 可自定义的进度条，显示HP/MP/GP恢复的周期进度

Punchline.Original: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.
Punchline.Translated: 更好的游戏消息系统和深入聊天过滤器，保持聊天窗口整洁。

Description.Original:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
Description.Translated:
强烈建议根据个人需求调整默认设置，因为您可能对哪些消息属于"垃圾信息"有不同见解！

提供精细的过滤选项，可过滤几乎所有游戏内的垃圾信息，只保留重要聊天内容。

- 过滤绝大多数烦人的游戏系统消息
- 屏蔽其他玩家的表情刷屏
- 将获得的赞数合并为单行显示
- 缩短冗长消息（如加入新人频道或进入副本区域的通知）
- 在一定时间内屏蔽重复出现的消息
- 自动将大部分"使用/say聊天模式"的任务对话复制到剪贴板
- 可自定义允许/屏蔽消息的过滤规则！
- 更多实用功能！

Punchline.Original: Tilt the camera, not yourself.
Punchline.Translated: 倾斜镜头，而非角色自身。

Description.Original: Automatically adjusts the Third Person Camera Angle/Distance given certain conditions.
Description.Translated: 根据特定条件自动调整第三人称视角角度/距离。

Punchline.Original: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.
Punchline.Translated: Tippy，你的FFXIV虚拟助手。

Description.Original:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal and adopted by Critical-Impact.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
Description.Translated:
由goat为2021年愚人节开发，后被kal不必要地复活并由Critical-Impact接手。

由我们最优秀的代码工匠精心打造，搭载特殊AI，
他将分析您的游戏风格，提供实用建议助您将游戏水平提升至新高度。

他能做到：
* 提供游戏通用建议
* 针对您当前职业给出提示
* 汇报您的战斗表现
* 会照顾您的感受

Punchline.Original: Create, share, and shuffle custom title and character select screens for FFXIV.
Punchline.Translated: 创建、分享并随机切换《最终幻想14》的自定义标题界面与角色选择画面。

Description.Original:
Create your own custom title or character select screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title and character select screen presets for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to use presets that others have shared!
Character select presets support recording your last visited location, per character display setting and even displaying yourself on a mount.
Description.Translated:
创建属于你的自定义标题画面或角色选择界面，每次都能直接进入你最爱的游戏场景。  
包含多款预装的标题画面与角色选择界面预设，供你直接使用或获取灵感，还有便捷的导入功能可使用他人分享的预设！  
角色选择预设支持记录你最后访问的位置、为每个角色单独设置显示选项，甚至能让你骑乘坐骑亮相。

Punchline.Original: Pick titles you want in a title roulette.
Punchline.Translated: 选择你想加入随机称号的称号。

Description.Original: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".
Description.Translated: 允许你选择任意数量的称号，每次使用"/ptitle"或"/ptitle 组名"时随机设置一个。

Punchline.Original: Keep on top of new items.
Punchline.Translated: 随时掌握新物品动态。

Description.Original: Displays new items, crystals, and gil as toasts.
Description.Translated: 以通知形式显示新获得的物品、水晶和金币。

Punchline.Original: A Plugin that lets you add notes to item Tooltips
Punchline.Translated: 一个可在物品提示信息中添加备注的插件

Description.Original: Right-click any item in your inventory to start adding a note,or make a label in the config window to start adding your own labels
Description.Translated: 右键点击背包中的任意物品开始添加备注，或在配置窗口中创建标签来添加自定义标签

Punchline.Original: Finish your sightseeing log.
Punchline.Translated: 完成你的风脉泉日志。

Description.Original:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

"sightseeing" icon by muhammad, from thenounproject.com CC BY 3.0
Description.Translated:
Tourist插件新增了一个窗口来协助完成风脉泉日志。

- 显示当前可触发的风脉泉观测点
- 为2.0版本风脉泉添加标记
- 在地图上直接查看观测点位置
- 隐藏已完成的或当前无法触发的观测点
- 显示每个观测点所需的触发指令

"风脉泉"图标由muhammad设计(源自thenounproject.com，CC BY 3.0协议)

Punchline.Original: Tracking data is fun
Punchline.Translated: 追踪数据很有趣

Description.Original:
### Normal Functions 
+ Track currency increase
+ Track teleport and npc repair costs
+ Track desynthesis results
+ Track retainer ventures

### Advanced  Functions
+ Track different coffer rewards
  - Venture Coffer
  - Materiel Container 3.0
  - Materiel Container 4.0
  - Sanctuary Materiel Container
+ Track Eureka bunny rewards
+ Track Eureka/Bozja lockboxes
Description.Translated:
### 基础功能
+ 追踪金币收入
+ 追踪传送与NPC修理费用
+ 追踪分解结果
+ 追踪雇员探险

### 进阶功能
+ 追踪不同类型宝箱奖励
  - 探险宝箱
  - 3.0版素材箱
  - 4.0版素材箱
  - 无人岛素材箱
+ 追踪南方博兹雅兔子币奖励
+ 追踪优雷卡/博兹雅战利品箱

Punchline.Original: Choo Choo
Punchline.Translated: 嘟嘟

Description.Original:
Import your data from Turtle, then manage everything in the GUI!

There is a known bug with the dragging of List of monsters. Dragging works, but there is a graphical glitch while dragging. It is completely cosmetic but annoying. The arrows work without issue. I will work on fixing this.
Description.Translated:
从Turtle导入数据，然后在图形界面中管理一切！

已知怪物列表拖拽功能存在一个bug。拖拽功能正常，但拖拽时会出现图形显示问题。这完全只是视觉效果问题但很烦人。箭头功能工作正常。我会尽快修复这个问题。

Punchline.Original: Triple triad solver
Punchline.Translated: 三重斗灵卡牌求解器

Description.Original:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window
Description.Translated:
三重斗智解算器，仅限NPC对战
- 在小游戏中高亮显示下一步行动
- 对战前评估所有预设卡组
- NPC专用卡组优化器
- 为卡牌收藏窗口添加更多详细信息

Punchline.Original: Sup y'all? It's ya boy, Twitch XIV, and today we're gonna be playing some final fantasy fourteen.
Punchline.Translated: 各位好啊！我是你们的老伙计Twitch XIV，今天我们要来玩最终幻想14（FF14）。

Description.Original: Allows you to join a Twitch chat and send messages and (optionally) have the twitch chat come through your chatbox.
Description.Translated: 允许你加入Twitch聊天室并发送消息，（可选）让Twitch聊天内容显示在你的游戏聊天框中。

Punchline.Original: Adds fully customizable toolbars and 3D world markers to the game.
Punchline.Translated: 为游戏添加完全可自定义的工具栏和3D世界标记。

Description.Original: Consolidates common UI elements and actions into a single uniform interface in the form of a set of highly customizable toolbars.
Description.Translated: 将常用UI元素和技能整合为一组高度可定制的工具栏，形成统一界面。

Punchline.Original: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname
Punchline.Translated: 记录玩家曾用名和昵称的简易工具

Description.Original: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname base on SocialList. Right click on the target to add/sub/check the used names and nickname.
Description.Translated: 基于社交列表记录玩家曾用名与昵称的简易工具。右键点击目标可添加/删除/查看曾用名与昵称。

Punchline.Original: VFX editor and viewer
Punchline.Translated: 特效编辑与查看器

Description.Original: VFX, animation, and sound editing plugin. Icon by PAPACHIN
Description.Translated: 视觉特效、动画与音效编辑插件。图标由PAPACHIN制作

Punchline.Original: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.
Punchline.Translated: 将技能保存并加载到热键栏中，无需占用额外的职业热键栏。

Description.Original: Allows you to use commands to save the actions in a hotbar and then load them into any other hotbar. Like the vanilla "/hotbar copy" command, but unlimited, without taking up other hotbars to save the actions.
Description.Translated: 允许你通过命令保存热键栏中的技能，并加载到任意其他热键栏。类似原生的"/热键栏 复制"指令，但无限制且不会占用其他热键栏来储存技能。

Punchline.Original: A collection of various game modifications
Punchline.Translated: 一系列游戏功能修改合集

Description.Original: This plugin is primarily focused on various UI adjustments, behavior adjustments, and adding new native elements to the game.
Description.Translated: 该插件主要专注于各种界面调整、行为调整以及为游戏添加新的原生元素。

Punchline.Original: Bookmark the venues you visit. View and manage guests for venues.
Punchline.Translated: 为你造访的场所添加书签。查看并管理场所的宾客名单。

Description.Original: Save and share venues you visit or own. Get updates and logs for visitors coming and going. Guest list management tools for venue owners to view and easily export it for use with other applications. Icon by Silv :)
Description.Translated: 保存并分享你参观或拥有的场馆。获取访客到访与离场的最新动态与日志。为场馆所有者提供访客名单管理工具，可查看并轻松导出数据以便在其他应用中使用。图标由Silv提供 :)

Punchline.Original: Tag items as important, highlighting them visually. Now with sound!
Punchline.Translated: 将物品标记为重要，使其高亮显示。现在包含音效！

Description.Original: Adding and removing items to and from the list of very important items can be done in the plugin's configuration window and by right-clicking items in the game. Very important items get their name highlighted in the tooltip, and a sound effect plays in addition to that to ensure you've seen its presence.
Description.Translated: 在插件配置窗口或游戏中右键点击物品即可添加/移除高优先级物品列表。高优先级物品的提示信息中名称会高亮显示，并伴随音效提醒确保你注意到它。

Punchline.Original: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Punchline.Translated: 允许你隐藏玩家、宠物、陆行鸟和仆从。

Description.Original:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Description.Translated:
允许你隐藏玩家、宠物、陆行鸟和宠物。
包含VoidList功能，这是一个更完善的黑名单。
可通过/pvis命令访问
更多信息可通过/xlhelp查看

Punchline.Original: Changes your VO language on a per-duty basis
Punchline.Translated: 根据任务自动切换语音语言

Description.Original: Changes your VO language by specifying a language and an instance, your language will revert to the default when you exit. Icon designed by Leremy from Flaticon
Description.Translated: 通过指定语言和实例来更改语音语言，退出时将恢复为默认语言。图标由Flaticon的Leremy设计

Punchline.Original: View encounter strategy images.
Punchline.Translated: 查看副本攻略图片。

Description.Original: Displays strategy images for encounters. Use /wdig to open.
Description.Translated: 显示副本攻略图片。使用/wdig命令打开。

Punchline.Original: View a list of all the Wondrous Tails duties shared by your party.
Punchline.Translated: 查看队伍成员共享的所有天书奇谈副本列表。

Description.Original: WTSync keeps uses an external server to keep track of the duties in your Wondrous Tails book. When you're in a party, and other players in the party are also using WTSync, you can open a UI to see which duties everyone needs at once in one convenient list.
Description.Translated: WTSync通过外部服务器同步记录您的《异闻神典石》副本进度。当您组队时，若队友也使用WTSync，可打开界面一键查看全队成员所需副本的便捷列表。

Punchline.Original: Set out for Dawntrail and make your queues a breeze. Waitingway provides crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.
Punchline.Translated: 启程前往晓月之终途，让排队更轻松。Waitingway提供FF14登录队列时间的众包数据，现已支持Discord队列通知功能。

Description.Original:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login, duty, and roulette queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your queue times to crowdsource information about FFXIV server load and activity. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
Description.Translated:
贡献并利用众筹的登录、任务和随机任务队列信息，造福所有玩家。

当前功能包括队列时间预估和通过Discord发送通知，让你能及时知晓何时进入游戏，同时匿名收集并上报你的队列时间统计数据，众筹关于FF14服务器负载和活跃度的信息。加入我们的Discord获取更多详情！

Discord链接：https://waiting.camora.dev/discord

Punchline.Original: Never mess up your wave emoticon again!
Punchline.Translated: 再也不会搞错你的波浪表情了！

Description.Original: Literally all this plugin does is send "o/" in chat if you accidentally type "/o"
Description.Translated: 这个插件的唯一功能就是在你不小心输入"/o"时自动在聊天框发送"o/"

Punchline.Original: Improved Waymark Management
Punchline.Translated: 改进版标记点管理

Description.Original: Allows you to save, edit, place, import, export, and preview an unlimited number of waymark presets.
Description.Translated: 允许你保存、编辑、放置、导入、导出及预览无限数量的路标预设。

Punchline.Original: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.
Punchline.Translated: 允许精确控制每个区域或全局的时间和天气。

Description.Translated:
功能：
- 随心更改游戏内时间和天气；
- 可全局应用或针对每个区域单独设置；
- 彻底阻止不想要的天气出现。

本插件仅改变视觉效果：与时间/天气相关的功能（如区域背景音乐、风脉泉可用性、特定物体状态）将不受影响。
仅对有开放天空的区域生效（目前尚未支持全部此类区域，持续开发中）。

Punchline.Original: Persistent NPC Flavor Text
Punchline.Translated: 持续显示NPC对话文本

Description.Original: Prints NPC speech bubbles to the chat log.  Please check the plugin settings and your chat log filters to make sure that they are compatible with each other.
Description.Translated: 将NPC对话气泡打印到聊天日志中。请检查插件设置和聊天日志过滤器以确保它们彼此兼容。

Punchline.Original: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.
Punchline.Translated: 在服务器信息旁显示你所在的区域/地区/领地信息。

Description.Original: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in up in the corner next to the server and time info. Open config with /waia.
Description.Translated: 在服务器信息和时间显示旁角区域显示当前所在区域/地带/领土。使用/waia命令打开配置。

Punchline.Original: Allows you to not lose track of your mouse on the screen
Punchline.Translated: 让你不会在屏幕上丢失鼠标指针的踪迹

Description.Original:
Add UI element on top of the mouse like circle to keep track of your mouse location during gameplay.
Open settings with /wmm
Description.Translated:
在游戏过程中添加圆形等UI元素到鼠标上方，以便追踪鼠标位置。
使用/wmm打开设置

Punchline.Original: Making it easier to know where you are.
Punchline.Translated: 让你更容易知道自己在哪里。

Description.Original: Movable text overlay of the current location name. Please consider migrationg to WhereAmIAgain, which is actively maintained and has more features.
Description.Translated: 当前位置名称的可移动文字覆盖层。建议迁移至仍在积极维护且功能更多的WhereAmIAgain插件。

Punchline.Original: Check what mount someone is using and browse the full mount collection.
Punchline.Translated: 查看某人当前使用的坐骑并浏览完整坐骑收藏。

Description.Original: Adds a 'Mount Search' option to the target's context menu, displaying mount information and acquisition details in the chat. Also includes a searchable mount database with detailed navigation.
Description.Translated: 为目标右键菜单添加"坐骑搜索"选项，在聊天栏显示坐骑信息与获取方式。同时包含可搜索的坐骑数据库，支持详细导航功能。

Punchline.Original: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!
Punchline.Translated: 快速查询物品发布的版本补丁！

Description.Original:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
Description.Translated:
当鼠标悬停在物品上时，提示框会显示该物品发布的版本号。
再也不用随身携带没用的老旧制作材料了！

Punchline.Original: Ever forget who you are? We can fix that!
Punchline.Translated: 忘记自己是谁了？我们能解决这个问题！

Description.Original: Shows who you are in the server info bar.
Description.Translated: 在服务器信息栏显示你的身份。

Punchline.Original: Actively logs healing, cleanses, buffs, and more. Finally figure out who rescued you.
Punchline.Translated: 主动记录治疗、净化、增益等行为。终于能知道是谁对你使用了营救。

Description.Original:
This plugin can track the following actions:
- Rescues
- Healing actions
- Status/Buff Application
- Cleanses 
- Heals
- Mitigation
- Provoke
- Shirk

These will be logged in your chat when they are used on your character.
Description.Translated:
该插件可以追踪以下技能：
- 营救
- 治疗类技能
- 状态/增益施加
- 净化
- 治疗
- 减伤
- 挑衅
- 退避

当这些技能对你使用时，将在聊天栏中记录。

Punchline.Original: Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
Punchline.Translated: 聊天记录插件，可按角色、分组查看历史记录或搜索。

Description.Original:
Chat history plugin, view history per character, per group, or search.
 Main command /whowhat
Description.Translated:
聊天记录插件，可按角色、分组查看历史记录或进行搜索。
主命令 /whowhat

Punchline.Original: Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft.
Punchline.Translated: 以时尚方式显示附近玩家，灵感源自《魔兽世界》的"/who"指令。

Description.Original:
Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft

Features:
- Minimalistic interface that can be scaled down to become part of your HUD.
- Player context menu items for examining, searching on the Lodestone and more.
- Customizable colours & behaviour.
- Random adventure plate command
- Display nearby player count in the server info bar

Please note this plugin will automatically disable functionality in PvP.
Description.Translated:
以《魔兽世界》"/who"指令为灵感，用时尚方式显示附近玩家

功能：
- 极简界面可缩放至最小尺寸，成为HUD的一部分
- 玩家右键菜单包含查看资料、在Lodestone搜索等功能
- 可自定义颜色与行为
- 随机冒险者铭牌指令
- 在服务器信息栏显示附近玩家人数

注意：本插件在PvP场景中会自动禁用功能

Punchline.Original: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.
Punchline.Translated: 在队伍列表上直接显示Discord语音活动状态。

Description.Original:
Once installed, join a Discord voice channel and an XIV party, and have people put their character names in their Discord nicknames (or configure things manually in the plugin settings). You should get colourful outlines around the job icons on the party list: green for talking, blue for muted, red for deafened, and yellow for unknown name.

Note that you'll get a permission prompt mentioning "StreamKit Overlay" – this is expected.

Some icons by Google, Apache 2.0.
Description.Translated:
安装后，加入一个Discord语音频道和FF14队伍，并让队员将角色名设为Discord昵称（或在插件设置中手动配置）。队伍列表的职业图标将显示彩色边框：绿色表示正在说话，蓝色表示静音，红色表示关闭声音，黄色表示未知名称。

注意您会收到关于"StreamKit Overlay"的权限提示——这属于正常现象。

部分图标由Google提供，遵循Apache 2.0协议。

Punchline.Original: FFXIV Wiki and Eorzea DB context menu integration
Punchline.Translated: FFXIV维基和艾欧泽亚数据库右键菜单整合

Description.Original: Never forget how to get an item again! Just right-click, and *gobbie-BOOM!* Integrates with any community wiki as well as the official Eorzea DB.
Description.Translated: 再也不用担心忘记如何获取物品了！只需右键点击，然后*哥布嘣！* 可整合任意社区维基及艾欧泽亚官方数据库。

Punchline.Original: Change your game window titie
Punchline.Translated: 更改游戏窗口标题

Description.Original: Allows you to change your game window title
Description.Translated: 允许修改游戏窗口标题

Punchline.Original: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
Punchline.Translated: 为九宫幻卡界面添加行概率显示。

Description.Original: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.
Description.Translated: 该插件会在游戏内显示《天书奇谈》中达成一行的概率，以及洗牌后的平均达成概率。

Punchline.Original: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.
Punchline.Translated: 一个角色扮演同义词词典与草稿板。

Description.Original: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
Description.Translated: Wordsmith是一款专为角色扮演玩家设计的文本编辑器。它能自动分段以便复制粘贴，拥有高级功能、拼写检查甚至同义词词典。

Punchline.Original: Optimize Island Sanctuary Workshop orders.
Punchline.Translated: 优化无人岛工坊订单。

Description.Original: Use /wso after you visited your island.
Description.Translated: 访问无人岛后使用/wso命令。

Punchline.Original: Use chat away from the game.
Punchline.Translated: 在游戏外使用聊天功能。

Description.Original:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.
Description.Translated:
XIVChat是一套软件工具，可让你在不同设备上使用FF14的聊天功能。这是运行所需的服务器组件。

有关配套客户端的信息，请参阅官网。

Punchline.Original: PvP, but in PvE!
Punchline.Translated: PVP，不过是PVE版！

Description.Original: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu
Description.Translated: 该插件可将连击技能与互斥技能整合到单个按钮上。/pcombo 打开菜单

Punchline.Original: Toggle controller / mouse mode automatically or with commands.
Punchline.Translated: 自动或通过指令切换控制器/鼠标模式。

Description.Original: A simple tool to automatically switch between keyboard and controller hud's when pressing WASD or moving the left joystick. You can setup a macro to add the actions to your hotbar.
Description.Translated: 一个简单的工具，可在按下WASD或移动左摇杆时自动切换键盘和手柄HUD界面。你可以设置宏来将技能添加到热键栏。

Punchline.Original: Turn your Elgato Stream Deck into a hotbar!
Punchline.Translated: 将你的Elgato Stream Deck变成热键栏！

Description.Original:
This plugin allows players to use an Elgato Stream Deck as a virtual utility hot bar. Actions are called directly, meaning there is no need to set up awkward keybinds, custom macros, or any other settings.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
Description.Translated:
该插件允许玩家使用Elgato Stream Deck作为虚拟功能热键栏。技能可直接调用，无需设置繁琐的按键绑定、自定义宏或其他设置。

请注意，必须同时安装XIVDeck Stream Deck插件才能正常使用。您可以在GitHub仓库的"Releases"部分下载Stream Deck插件。

遇到任何问题请向Dalamud支持服务器的KazWolfe#2896报告，或在GitHub上提交Issue。

Punchline.Original: Highlight duplicated items in inventories /xivdupes.
Punchline.Translated: 高亮显示背包中的重复物品 /xivdupes

Description.Original: Highlight stackable items in the inventory that are not stacked.
Description.Translated: 高亮显示背包中未堆叠的可堆叠物品。

Punchline.Original: Fixes SquareEnix' botched antialiasing implementation
Punchline.Translated: 修复SquareEnix糟糕的抗锯齿实现

Description.Original:
With the release of 7.0 SquareEnix has implemented several temporal antialiasing solutions. However they all have a severe bug that affects image quality significantly.
This plugin will restore using jitter when talking to NPCs or in cutscenes and gpose. Jitter (not noticeable micromovements of the camera) is necessary for temporal antialiasing solutions (DLSS, DLAA, TSCMAA+jitter) to work properly.
For some reason, SquareEnix decided we don't need jitter during the time where the game benefits from using it the most.
Description.Translated:
随着7.0版本的发布，SquareEnix实装了多种时间性抗锯齿方案。但它们都存在严重影响画质的严重缺陷。
本插件将在与NPC对话、过场动画和拍照模式时恢复使用抖动效果。抖动（肉眼不可察觉的镜头微动）是DLSS、DLAA、TSCMAA+抖动等时间性抗锯齿方案正常工作的必要条件。
出于某些原因，SquareEnix认为游戏最需要抗锯齿效果的场景反而应该禁用抖动。

Punchline.Original: Save chat logs to your computer as text files or copy them!
Punchline.Translated: 将聊天记录保存为文本文件或复制到剪贴板！

Description.Original: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
Description.Translated: 保存聊天记录为文本文件（加载本插件后生效）。使用/xivlogger设置，/savelog保存日志，/copylogs复制日志。

Punchline.Original: Splits combos into more button for more button bloating. Requires BLU spells.
Punchline.Translated: 将连击拆分为更多按键以实现按键膨胀。需要青魔法师技能。

Description.Original: This plugin splits combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto several buttons. For example, a 1-1-1 combo would become 1-2-3.
Description.Translated: 该插件会将连击技能和互斥技能拆分成多个按钮。例如，1-1-1连击会变为1-2-3。

Punchline.Original: Game window resizing plugin. Ever wanted to take 8K screenshots on 144p screen? Now you can.
Punchline.Translated: 游戏窗口缩放插件。想在144p屏幕上拍8K截图吗？现在可以实现了。

Description.Original:
Set your game window to arbitrary size not limited by your display resolution. Mostly useful for taking high-resolution screenshots without going fullscreen and using DSR/FSR.
Requires borderless or windowed mode.
Description.Translated:
将游戏窗口设置为不受显示器分辨率限制的任意尺寸。主要用于在不进入全屏和使用DSR/FSR的情况下拍摄高分辨率截图。
需要无边框或窗口化模式。

Punchline.Original: Takes a screenshot upon death (and other events).
Punchline.Translated: 在死亡（及其他事件）时自动截图。

Description.Original: Takes a screenshot upon death (and other events).
Description.Translated: 在死亡（及其他事件）时自动截图。

Punchline.Original: A simple utility that allows easy export of your gearsets to xivgear.app.
Punchline.Translated: 一个简易工具，可轻松将你的装备方案导出至xivgear.app。

Description.Original:
A plugin that allows easy export of your gearsets to xivgear.app in edit or view mode. Also includes the ability to export your gearsets from the gearset list.

Use /xivgearexport or /xge to export your current gear set.
Description.Translated:
一个可将装备套装轻松导出至xivgear.app编辑或查看模式的插件。同时支持从装备套装列表中导出。

使用/xivgearexport或/xge命令导出当前装备套装。

Punchline.Original: ZeeDees, bring the Zs to your Ds!
Punchline.Translated: ZeeDees，给你的D带来Z的力量！

Description.Original: Show when cooldowns come off cooldown in an intuitive way!
Description.Translated: 显示技能冷却结束时间的直观方式！

Punchline.Original: Complete your Zodiac relic with style.
Punchline.Translated: 用时尚风格完成你的黄道武器。

Description.Original: This plugin attempts to help you complete your Zodiac weapon in various ways.
Description.Translated: 该插件旨在通过多种方式协助你完成黄道武器任务。

Punchline.Original: Crowdsourced housing alerts and lottery tracking for all.
Punchline.Translated: 全民共享的房屋购买提醒与抽签追踪系统。

Description.Original:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.
View the list of all houses available on a world at https://paissadb.zhu.codes/!

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.
Description.Translated:
在寻找理想住宅吗？PaissaHouse能在你的服务器有新土地出售时发送通知。
查看全服务器可用房屋列表请访问：https://paissadb.zhu.codes/！

想参与贡献？查看仓库（下方地球图标）获取说明。

Punchline.Original: Make borderless window mode work well with aero shortcuts
Punchline.Translated: 使无边框窗口模式与Aero快捷键完美兼容

Description.Original: Borderless window can now be properly minimized (by clicking on taskbar or by win+down shortcut); when moved between monitors (win+shift+left/right), resolution is updated automatically.
Description.Translated: 无边框窗口现在可以正确最小化（通过点击任务栏或使用Win+下快捷键）；在不同显示器间移动时（Win+Shift+左/右），分辨率会自动更新。

Punchline.Original: Customizable, Source Engine-styled position info
Punchline.Translated: 可自定义的、Source引擎风格的位置信息

Description.Original: Shows your exact position, rotation, and velocity on screen. Based off of the cl_showpos command from the Source Engine.
Description.Translated: 在屏幕上显示你的精确位置、朝向和移动速度。基于Source引擎的cl_showpos命令。

Punchline.Original: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.
Punchline.Translated: 添加一个简单的界面用于浏览和更改游戏内背景音乐。

Description.Original:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.
Description.Translated:
管弦乐插件允许你更改当前播放的游戏背景音乐。它包含经过精心整理的精确游戏曲目列表，让你能准确知道正在播放的音乐，方便日后查询！可将喜爱的歌曲单独收藏标记。

注意：该插件目前不支持播放实际的管弦乐琴乐谱音乐。

Punchline.Original: owo for your chat
Punchline.Translated: owo 聊天用语

Description.Original: This plugin uwu's your chat.
Description.Translated: 这个插件会将你的聊天内容萌化。

Punchline.Original: Let people know when you r typing.
Punchline.Translated: 让别人知道你正在输入。

Description.Original: Allows other people using this plugin to see your typing status when in the same party.
Description.Translated: 允许其他使用此插件的玩家在同一小队时看到你的输入状态。

Punchline.Original: Mod to allow VR
Punchline.Translated: 允许VR的模组

Description.Original:
Mod to allow vr. Requires SteamVR Not the steam version of the game
** Requires SteamVR **
Please click the globe icon for detailed instructions.
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
Description.Translated:
支持VR的模组。需要SteamVR（非Steam版本游戏）
**需要安装SteamVR**
请点击地球图标查看详细说明
聊天/常见问题解答：flat2vr.com
